basic.description: This course includes topics such as: collection, keying, and curation of local insects.
basic.subject: ZOO
basic.title: Insect Diversity of North Florida

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L and MAC 2311. Pre- or corequisite: ZOO 4823.
